definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.chinese: 具有圓面及錐面印刷功能。
採用錐面車削附加裝置。

sentences.english: This design method is used for internal cone face grinder by batch process.
sentences.chinese: 該設計方法已經在批量生產的錐面磨牀上獲得應用。

sentences.english: It has function of cylindrical printing and conical printing;
sentences.chinese: 具有圓面及錐面印刷功能。

sentences.english: Place Taper-lock Bushing and Timing Belt Pulley on the transmission shaft.
sentences.chinese: 將錐面緊固套與同步帶輪裝在傳動輪上。

sentences.english: The practical formulas for the rotationally symmetrical cylinders and cones are derived.
sentences.chinese: 對於迴轉柱面和錐面導出了實用公式。
